duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand and interpret codes, standards, specifications, and procedures for performing QA functions and NDT inspections.
Demonstrate practical Quality Control / Quality Assurance background in applicable materials, fabrication, and product technology.
Have sufficient training hours and experience in NDT methods and demonstrate NDT proficiency.
Travel nationwide with the potential to evaluate part-time employee options.

education_certification.credential: Certification by ASNT as an NDT Level II or ACCP Professional Level II in applicable methods
